lead_paragraph: Whether viewed as electrifying and flamboyant or as egotistical and annoying, Cam Newton stands tall as the one-of-a-kind quarterback of the Carolina Panthers.

headline.print_headline: Love Him or Hate Him, Newton Blossoms in Run to Super Bowl
headline.main: Love Him or Hate Him, Newton Blossoms in Run to Super Bowl

snippet: Whether viewed as electrifying and flamboyant or as egotistical and annoying, Cam Newton stands tall as the one-of-a-kind quarterback of the Carolina Panthers....
